trans-unit.source: Provides methods for persisting Web server controls at design-time.
The ControlPersister class provides methods that can persist a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> control or an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> interface implementation as a string of aspx code.

The implementation of these methods is driven by metadata attributes, such as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>, <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute>.
> [!NOTE] > The Web Forms page designer does not support the `Reset``PropertyName` method that is optionally exposed by Microsoft Windows Forms-based controls for property persistence.

To create a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> object or an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> interface by parsing a string of control- or template-persistence data, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser> class methods.
Gets a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified control.
This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
This method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A> of the specified control to retrieve the designer host.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to persist.
A string that represents the persisted form of the control.
Outputs a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified control to the specified <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>.
This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
This method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A> of the specified control to retrieve the designer host.
The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to output the persisted control data to.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to persist.
Gets a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified control, using the specified designer host.
This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to persist.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that is the designer host for the control.
A string that represents the persisted form of the control.
Outputs a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified control to the specified <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>, using the specified designer host.
This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to output the persisted control data to.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to persist.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that is the designer host for the control.
Gets a string of data that can persist the inner properties of the specified control.
This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
The component to persist the inner properties of.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that is the designer host for the control.
A string that contains the information to persist about the inner properties of the control.
Outputs a string of data that can persist the inner properties of the specified control to the specified <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>, using the specified designer host.
This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to use.
The component to persist.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that is the designer host for the control.
Gets a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified template.
The PersistTemplate method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface implementation in order to work correctly.
The template to persist.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that is the designer host for the control.
A string that represents the persisted form of the template.
Writes a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified template to the specified <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> object.
The PersistTemplate method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface implementation in order to work correctly.
The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to write the persisted template data to.
The template to persist.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that is the designer host for the control.
